H0.text: Greenhouse gases are gases that absorb heat in the atmosphere.

H1.text: Microwave gases are gases that absorb heat in the atmosphere.

H2.text: Ozone gases are gases that absorb heat in the atmosphere.

H3.text: Carbonate gases are gases that absorb heat in the atmosphere.

A4.text: Greenhouse gases (GHGs) are the gases in an atmosphere that trap heat, raising the surface temperature of astronomical bodies such as Earth.
